text: @mattgaetz Wait.  You KNOW these people? That makes sense.  We are locked in our homes is because YOUR president has botched the response to the coronavirus by denying it.  My cat could have done an infinitely better job and he doesn't have thumbs.  As for MS-13 you are paranoid. 1/
